reviewContent: Bismarck Airport does not have a 24-hour Terminal. The Terminal closes 1/2 an hour after last flight for the day. The terminal will not re-open until 3am. Everyone in the Terminal will be required to leave from 1/2 an hour after last flight until 3am so that required security checks can be completed. It is not allowed to spend the night in the Bismarck Airport Terminal. Please plan appropriately.
